Debits∵

A Debit resource represents a transaction consisting of obtaining (charging) money from a funding instrument, i.e, a Card or BankAccount.

A debit can be created by debiting a Card or BankAccount directly.

Debits have a status attribute representing the current status of the debit throughout the payout process. There are three possible status values:

pending
As soon as the debit is created through the API, the status shows as pending. This indicates that Balanced received the information for the debit and will begin processing. The ACH network itself processes transactions in a batch format. Batch submissions are processed at 3pm PST on business days. If the debit is created after 3pm PST, it will not be submitted for processing until 3pm PST the next business day.
succeeded
After 3-4 days, the status will change to succeeded and the funds will be available in escrow.
failed
After 3-4 days, the status will change to failed if the transaction was not successful due to a problem such as an incorrect bank account number or insufficient funds.

Available Query Filters
amount

Available Operations: =, !=, <, <=, >, >=, in, !in

Default Operation: =

Sortable: True

created_at

Available Operations: =, !=, <, <=, >, >=

Default Operation: =

Sortable: True

meta

Available Operations: contains, !contains

Default Operation: contains

Sortable: False

status

Available Operations: in, !in, =

Default Operation: in

Sortable: False

transaction_number

Available Operations: =, !=, startswith, endswith, contains, !contains, in, !in, ilike, !ilike

Default Operation: =

Sortable: False

Create a Card Debit∵

Debit (charge) a tokenized credit card.

amount
optional integer. The amount of the debit in cents.
appears_on_statement_as

optional string. Text that will appear on the buyer's statement. Characters that can be used are limited to:

  • ASCII letters (a-z and A-Z)
  • Digits (0-9)
  • Special characters (.<>(){}[]+&!$;-%_?:#@~=\'" ^`|)

Any other characters will be rejected. Debits - Truncated to 18 characters. Credits - Truncated to 14 characters.

All Visa, Master Card, Discover, American Express debits will have a prefix of "BAL*" e.g. "BAL*marketplace.com".

ACH debits and credits do not have a prefix.

American Express pending transactions will be shown as "BALANCED INC". AMEX pending transactions are hidden by default in the American Express web portal. Once the debit is settled it will convert to "BAL*<appears_on_statement_as>".

description
optional string. Free-text description of the debit for the dashboard.
meta
optional object. Single level mapping from string keys to string values.
order
optional string. The order this debit is associated with
source
optional string. The funding instrument debited

Definition

POST https://api.balancedpayments.com/cards/:card_id/debits

Balanced::Card.debit

balanced.Card().debit()

balanced.get().debit()

Card().debit(Map<String, Object> payload)

Balanced\Card->debits->create()

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/cards/CC4N9xGpzdxJ3W5WWdPOqrQX/debits \
     -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
     -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL: \
     -d "appears_on_statement_as=Statement text" \
     -d "amount=5000" \
     -d "description=Some descriptive text for the debit in the dashboard"

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

card = Balanced::Card.fetch('/cards/CC7mV4UKT6jJOh6nerLFvHJu')
card.debit(
  :amount => 5000,
  :appears_on_statement_as => 'Statement text',
  :description => 'Some descriptive text for the debit in the dashboard'
)

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

card = balanced.Card.fetch('/cards/CC68IoCVpoFlkugB7xt52p8C')
card.debit(
  appears_on_statement_as='Statement text',
  amount=5000,
  description='Some descriptive text for the debit in the dashboard'
)

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.get('/cards/CC4N9xGpzdxJ3W5WWdPOqrQX').debit({
    "appears_on_statement_as": "Statement text", 
    "amount": 5000, 
    "description": "Some descriptive text for the debit in the dashboard"
})

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

Card card = new Card("/cards/CC4GOYzOKyWXBzJMVTs00aNk");

HashMap<String, Object> payload = new HashMap<String, Object>();
payload.put("amount", 5000);
payload.put("description", "Some descriptive text for the debit in the dashboard");
payload.put("appears_on_statement_as", "Statement text");

try {
    Debit debit = card.debit(payload);
}
catch (HTTPError e) {}

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

$card = Balanced\Card::get("/cards/CC3yyHvHx0IkXJa7oxUUHxc6");
$card->debits->create(array(
    "amount" => "5000",
    "appears_on_statement_as" => "Statement text",
    "description" => "Some descriptive text for the debit in the dashboard",
));

?>

Example Response

{
    "debits": [
        {
            "amount": 5000, 
            "appears_on_statement_as": "BAL*Statement text", 
            "created_at": "2014-03-27T16:12:40.236430Z", 
            "currency": "USD", 
            "description": "Some descriptive text for the debit in the dashboard", 
            "failure_reason": null, 
            "failure_reason_code": null, 
            "href": "/debits/WD4PwaLeauXIuwGsdugS8tWM", 
            "id": "WD4PwaLeauXIuwGsdugS8tWM", 
            "links": {
                "customer": "CU4fnEqSkJ1GtfI9yjBE0lpC", 
                "dispute": null, 
                "order": null, 
                "source": "CC4N9xGpzdxJ3W5WWdPOqrQX"
            }, 
            "meta": {}, 
            "status": "succeeded", 
            "transaction_number": "W603-743-0475", 
            "updated_at": "2014-03-27T16:12:41.441291Z"
        }
    ], 
    "links": {
        "debits.customer": "/customers/{debits.customer}", 
        "debits.dispute": "/disputes/{debits.dispute}", 
        "debits.events": "/debits/{debits.id}/events", 
        "debits.order": "/orders/{debits.order}", 
        "debits.refunds": "/debits/{debits.id}/refunds", 
        "debits.source": "/resources/{debits.source}"
    }
}

Create a Bank Account Debit∵

Debit (charge) a bank account.

note
A bank account must be verified with micro deposits before it can be debited. See Bank Account Verifications.
amount
optional integer. The amount of the debit in cents.
appears_on_statement_as

optional string. Text that will appear on the buyer's statement. Characters that can be used are limited to:

  • ASCII letters (a-z and A-Z)
  • Digits (0-9)
  • Special characters (.<>(){}[]+&!$;-%_?:#@~=\'" ^`|)

Any other characters will be rejected. Debits - Truncated to 18 characters. Credits - Truncated to 14 characters.

All Visa, Master Card, Discover, American Express debits will have a prefix of "BAL*" e.g. "BAL*marketplace.com".

ACH debits and credits do not have a prefix.

American Express pending transactions will be shown as "BALANCED INC". AMEX pending transactions are hidden by default in the American Express web portal. Once the debit is settled it will convert to "BAL*<appears_on_statement_as>".

description
optional string. Free-text description of the debit for the dashboard.
meta
optional object. Single level mapping from string keys to string values.
order
optional string. The order this debit is associated with
source
optional string. The funding instrument debited

Definition

POST https://api.balancedpayments.com/bank_accounts/:bank_account_id/debits

Balanced::BankAccount.debit

balanced.BankAccount().debit()

balanced.get().debit()

BankAccount().debit(Map<String, Object> payload)

Balanced\BankAccount->debits->create();

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/bank_accounts/BA40m4YxkdjWbasw6sWbu79g/debits \
     -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
     -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL: \
     -d "appears_on_statement_as=Statement text" \
     -d "amount=5000" \
     -d "description=Some descriptive text for the debit in the dashboard"

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

bank_account = Balanced::BankAccount.fetch('/bank_accounts/BA6ARjzdSjbnDWFK6ykjuGhy')
bank_account.debit(
  :amount => 5000,
  :appears_on_statement_as => 'Statement text',
  :description => 'Some descriptive text for the debit in the dashboard'
)

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

bank_account = balanced.BankAccount.fetch('/bank_accounts/BA50LpPrCTB63Ecm0wEgdOQM')
bank_account.debit(
  appears_on_statement_as='Statement text',
  amount=5000,
  description='Some descriptive text for the debit in the dashboard'
)

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.get('/bank_accounts/BA40m4YxkdjWbasw6sWbu79g').debit({
    "appears_on_statement_as": "Statement text", 
    "amount": 5000, 
    "description": "Some descriptive text for the debit in the dashboard"
})

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

BankAccount bankAccount = new BankAccount("/bank_accounts/BA3EMnkybAfEzVlbVquXFLEk");

HashMap<String, Object> payload = new HashMap<String, Object>();
payload.put("amount", 5000);
payload.put("description", "Some descriptive text for the debit in the dashboard");
payload.put("appears_on_statement_as", "Statement text");

try {
    Debit debit = bankAccount.debit(payload);
}
catch (HTTPError e) {}

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

$bank_account = Balanced\BankAccount::get("/bank_accounts/BA2FRIFG3IUSkPZYnFll6g8S");
$bank_account->debits->create(array(
    "amount" => "5000",
    "appears_on_statement_as" => "Statement text",
    "description" => "Some descriptive text for the debit in the dashboard",
));


?>

Example Response

    "debits": [
        {
            "amount": 5000, 
            "appears_on_statement_as": "BAL*Statement text",

            "description": "Some descriptive text for the debit in the dashboard", 
            "failure_reason": null, 
            "failure_reason_code": null, 
            "href": "/debits/WD4kjojigdAArnt5TQPIWvSM",

                "customer": null,

            },

        "debits.customer": "/customers/{debits.customer}", 
        "debits.dispute": "/disputes/{debits.dispute}", 
        "debits.events": "/debits/{debits.id}/events",

        "debits.refunds": "/debits/{debits.id}/refunds", 
        "debits.source": "/resources/{debits.source}"
    }
}

Fetch a Debit∵

Fetches the details of a created debit.

Definition

GET https://api.balancedpayments.com/debits/:debit_id

Balanced::Debit.fetch

balanced.Debit.fetch()

balanced.get()

Debit(String uri)

Balanced\Debit::get

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/debits/WD4PwaLeauXIuwGsdugS8tWM \
     -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
     -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL:

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

debit = Balanced::Debit.fetch('/debits/WD7pddP29XzWJaKVUlMKETIb')

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

debit = balanced.Debit.fetch('/debits/WD5PTwr2bwJLIyJio1pEpYBr')

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.get('/debits/WD4PwaLeauXIuwGsdugS8tWM')

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

Debit debit = new Debit("/debits/WD4scrlw85LkeIEQqOx3AgUW");

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

$debit = Balanced\Debit::get("/debits/WD3dkNPNQtHiYcvFLWUkotAJ");

?>

Example Response

            "amount": 5000,

            }, 
            "meta": {},

        }

        "debits.customer": "/customers/{debits.customer}",

        "debits.refunds": "/debits/{debits.id}/refunds", 
        "debits.source": "/resources/{debits.source}"
    }
}

List All Debits∵

Returns a list of all debits created in the marketplace. The debits are returned in sorted order, with the most recent debits appearing first.

limit
optional integer. Defaults to 10.
offset
optional integer. Defaults to 0.

Definition

GET https://api.balancedpayments.com/debits

Balanced::Debit.all

balanced.Debit.query

balanced.marketplaces.debits

Debit.Collection(String uri)

Balanced\Marketplace::mine()->debits

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/debits \
      -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
      -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL:

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

debits = Balanced::Debit.all

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

debits = balanced.Debit.query

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.marketplaces.debits

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

Debit.Collection debits = new Debit.Collection(Debit.resource_href);

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

$marketplace = Balanced\Marketplace::mine();
$debits = $marketplace->debits->query()->all();

?>

Example Response

Update a Debit∵

Updates information about a debit

description
optional string. Free-text description of the debit for the dashboard.
meta
optional object. Single level mapping from string keys to string values.

Definition

PUT https://api.balancedpayments.com/debits/:debit_id

Balanced::Debit.save

balanced.Debit().save()

balanced.get().save()

Debit.save()

Balanced\Debit->save()

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/debits/WD4PwaLeauXIuwGsdugS8tWM \
     -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
     -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL: \
     -X PUT \
     -d "description=New description for debit" \
     -d "meta[facebook.id]=1234567890" \
     -d "meta[anykey]=valuegoeshere"

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

debit = Balanced::Debit.fetch('/debits/WD7pddP29XzWJaKVUlMKETIb')
debit.description = 'New description for debit'
debit.meta = {
    'anykey' => 'valuegoeshere',
    'facebook.id' => '1234567890'
}
debit.save

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

debit = balanced.Debit.fetch('/debits/WD5PTwr2bwJLIyJio1pEpYBr')
debit.description = 'New description for debit'
debit.meta = {
  'facebook.id': '1234567890',
  'anykey': 'valuegoeshere',
}
debit.save()

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.get('/debits/WD4PwaLeauXIuwGsdugS8tWM')
    .set('description', 'something useful')
    .save()

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

Debit debit = new Debit("/debits/WD4scrlw85LkeIEQqOx3AgUW");
debit.description = "New description for debit";

Map<String, String> meta = new HashMap<String, String>();
meta.put("anykey", "valuegoeshere");
meta.put("facebook.id", "1234567890");

debit.meta = meta;

try {
    debit.save();
}
catch (HTTPError e) {}

$debit = Balanced\Debit::get("/debits/WD3dkNPNQtHiYcvFLWUkotAJ");
$debit->description = "New description for debit";
$debit->meta = array(
    "anykey" => "valuegoeshere",
    "facebook.id" => "1234567890",
);
$debit->save();

?>

Refund a Debit∵

Issues a refund for a Debit. A Refund can be for any amount less than or equal to the original Debit amount.

amount
optional integer. The amount in cents for this refund
description
optional string. Free-text description of the refund for the dashboard.
meta
optional object. Single level mapping from string keys to string values.

Definition

POST https://api.balancedpayments.com/debits/:debit_id/refunds

Balanced::Debit.refund

balanced.Debit().refund()

balanced.debit.refund()

Debit().refund()

Balanced\Debit->refunds->create()

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/debits/WD5dTgHQskkZY41dDVgmSvlC/refunds \
     -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
     -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL: \
     -d "amount=3000" \
     -d "description=Refund for Order #1111" \
     -d "meta[merchant.feedback]=positive" \
     -d "meta[user.refund_reason]=not happy with product" \
     -d "meta[fulfillment.item.condition]=OK"

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

debit = Balanced::Debit.fetch('/debits/WD1doNnNgRQRLElx7ZHzsXS')
debit.refund(
  :amount => 3000,
  :description => 'Refund for Order #1111',
  :meta => {
    'fulfillment.item.condition' => 'OK',
    'merchant.feedback' => 'positive',
    'user.refund_reason' => 'not happy with product'
  }
)

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

debit = balanced.Debit.fetch('/debits/WD6BKYhbRzlRhfKSE1DcpqS5')
refund = debit.refund(
    amount=3000,
    description="Refund for Order #1111",
    meta={
        "merchant.feedback": "positive",
        "user.refund_reason": "not happy with product",
        "fulfillment.item.condition": "OK",
    }
)

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.get('/debits/WD5dTgHQskkZY41dDVgmSvlC').refund({
    "amount": 3000, 
    "meta": {
        "merchant.feedback": "positive", 
        "user.refund_reason": "not happy with product", 
        "fulfillment.item.condition": "OK"
    }, 
    "description": "Refund for Order #1111"
})

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

Debit debit = new Debit("/debits/WD57kmfV9Cgc0MiZkHOmFU1z");

HashMap<String, Object> meta = new HashMap<String, Object>();
meta.put("user.refund_reason", "not happy with product");
meta.put("merchant.feedback", "positive");
meta.put("fulfillment.item.condition", "OK");

HashMap<String, Object> payload = new HashMap<String, Object>();
payload.put("amount", 3000);
payload.put("description", "Refund for Order #1111");
payload.put("meta", meta);

try {
    debit.refund(payload);
}
catch (HTTPError e) {}

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

$debit = Balanced\Debit::get("/debits/WD3SFdYOlB5RwfwLvkRtjoNA");

$debit->refunds->create(array(
    'description' => 'Refund for Order #1111',
    'meta' => array(
            "fulfillment.item.condition" => "OK",
            "merchant.feedback" => "positive",
            "user.refund_reason" => "not happy with product",
        )
));


?>
